channel.title: SevenAtSevenSportsAndEntertainment

item.title: Pete Rose Visitation Plans Announced, 14-Hour Ceremony At Reds' Stadium

item.title: 3 More Agatha Christie Movies & Which Books They'll Adapt Confirmed By 20th Century Boss
item.description: 20th Century Studios' president reveals there are three upcoming Agatha Christie adaptations in the works and shares which books they'll be tackling.

item.title: Netflix's Don't Move Cast & Character Guide
item.description: While walking through the story of a grieving woman's struggle to survive, Netflix's Don't Move also features compelling performances from its cast.

item.title: Patrick Dempsey Confirms Scream 7 Talks & Teases Potential Return
item.description: Franchise veteran Patrick Dempsey confirms that he has been approached to return for Scream 7, and teases his potential return opposite Neve Campbell.
